metadata.title: RA Family: Can this kit do other than VCR and NLU?

sections.content:
Question:
Can this kit do other than VCR and NLU?
Answer:
Yes. As an example:
(1) by using this board as a hardware reference, you can test using your own Voice based AI model or other AI Partner of your preference.
(2) implement applicaton examples provided by Renesas and/or Renesas' Ready Partner such as Voice Anti-spoofing(by Renesas) and/or SpeakerID(AIZip).
Suitable Products
RA8M1
